sentences.english: Will the sample needs of solder part in flux in 5 to 10 seconds.

sentences.english: The ameliorative conditions of the supersonic atomizing equipment of producing lead-free solder powder are found.

sentences.english: Therefore, a lot of problem arises as more and more Lead-Free Soldering takes place.

sentences.english: The extremely thin oxide coat will also hinder the solder wetting effect on metal surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 而極薄的氧化層也將防礙金屬表面上焊錫的潤溼作用。

sentences.english: A special high-performance flux-cored solder shows its superiority in solder-ability and low corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 本樹脂芯焊錫絲具有極強的焊接能力和較低的腐蝕性。

sentences.english: Is the solderability test frequency being performed at a minimum of once per lot?

sentences.english: The litz that I have can be easily tinned by using a hot soldering iron and solder.
sentences.chinese: 用電烙鐵和焊錫可以很容易的給李茲線上錫。

sentences.english: The use of fluxes with different activities affects the solderability and wetting balance of Pd coating.
sentences.chinese: 不同活性助焊劑的使用也會影響鈀鍍層的焊錫性能。

sentences.english: The higher the temperature is , the bigger the stirring flow of the solder surface is, the more the scum there will be.
sentences.chinese: 溫度越高及焊錫表面的攪流越大，形成的浮渣越多。
